title: 旧约 - 约伯记(Job) - 第 36 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 约伯记(Job) -- 第 36 章 ( 本篇共有 42 章 )

lineList.en: Elihu also proceeded, and said,
lineList.cn: 以利户又接着说，

lineList.en: Suffer me a little, and I will shew thee that I have yet to speak on God's behalf.
lineList.cn: 你再容我片时，我就指示你，因我还有话为神说。

lineList.en: I will fetch my knowledge from afar, and will ascribe righteousness to my Maker.
lineList.cn: 我要将所知道的从远处引来，将公义归给造我的主。

lineList.en: For truly my words shall not be false: he that is perfect in knowledge is with thee.
lineList.cn: 我的言语真不虚谎。有知识全备的与你同在。

lineList.en: Behold, God is mighty, and despiseth not any: he is mighty in strength and wisdom.
lineList.cn: 神有大能，并不藐视人。他的智慧甚广。

lineList.en: He preserveth not the life of the wicked: but giveth right to the poor.
lineList.cn: 他不保护恶人的性命，却为困苦人伸冤。

lineList.en: He withdraweth not his eyes from the righteous: but with kings are they on the throne; yea, he doth establish them for ever, and they are exalted.
lineList.cn: 他时常看顾义人，使他们和君王同坐宝座，永远要被高举。

lineList.en: And if they be bound in fetters, and be holden in cords of affliction;
lineList.cn: 他们若被锁链捆住，被苦难的绳索缠住，

lineList.en: Then he sheweth them their work, and their transgressions that they have exceeded.
lineList.cn: 他就把他们的作为，和过犯指示他们，叫他们知道有骄傲的行动。

lineList.en: He openeth also their ear to discipline, and commandeth that they return from iniquity.
lineList.cn: 他也开通他们的耳朵，得受教训，吩咐他们离开罪孽转回。

lineList.en: If they obey and serve him, they shall spend their days in prosperity, and their years in pleasures.
lineList.cn: 他们若听从事奉他，就必度日亨通，历年福乐。

lineList.en: But if they obey not, they shall perish by the sword, and they shall die without knowledge.
lineList.cn: 若不听从，就要被刀杀灭，无知无识而死。

lineList.en: But the hypocrites in heart heap up wrath: they cry not when he bindeth them.
lineList.cn: 那心中不敬虔的人积蓄怒气。神捆绑他们，他们竟不求救。

lineList.en: They die in youth, and their life is among the unclean.
lineList.cn: 必在青年时死亡，与污秽人一样丧命。

lineList.en: He delivereth the poor in his affliction, and openeth their ears in oppression.
lineList.cn: 神藉着困苦救拔困苦人，趁他们受欺压，开通他们的耳朵。

lineList.en: Even so would he have removed thee out of the strait into a broad place, where there is no straitness; and that which should be set on thy table should be full of fatness.
lineList.cn: 神也必引你出离患难，进入宽阔不狭窄之地。摆在你席上的必满有肥甘。

lineList.en: But thou hast fulfilled the judgment of the wicked: judgment and justice take hold on thee.
lineList.cn: 但你满口有恶人批评的言语。判断和刑罚抓住你。

lineList.en: Because there is wrath, beware lest he take thee away with his stroke: then a great ransom cannot deliver thee.
lineList.cn: 不可容忿怒触动你，使你不服责罚。也不可因赎价大就偏行。

lineList.en: Will he esteem thy riches? no, not gold, nor all the forces of strength.
lineList.cn: 你的呼求（或作资财），或是你一切的势力，果有灵验，叫你不受患难吗。

lineList.en: Desire not the night, when people are cut off in their place.
lineList.cn: 不要切慕黑夜，就是众民在本处被除灭的时候。

lineList.en: Take heed, regard not iniquity: for this hast thou chosen rather than affliction.
lineList.cn: 你要谨慎，不可重看罪孽，因你选择罪孽，过于选择苦难。

lineList.en: Behold, God exalteth by his power: who teacheth like him?
lineList.cn: 神行事有高大的能力。教训人的有谁像他呢。

lineList.en: Who hath enjoined him his way? or who can say, Thou hast wrought iniquity?
lineList.cn: 谁派定他的道路。谁能说，你所行的不义。

lineList.en: Remember that thou magnify his work, which men behold.
lineList.cn: 你不可忘记称赞他所行的为大，就是人所歌颂的。

lineList.en: Every man may see it; man may behold it afar off.
lineList.cn: 他所行的，万人都看见，世人也从远处观看。

lineList.en: Behold, God is great, and we know him not, neither can the number of his years be searched out.
lineList.cn: 神为大，我们不能全知，他的年数不能测度。

lineList.en: For he maketh small the drops of water: they pour down rain according to the vapour thereof:
lineList.cn: 他吸取水点，这水点从云雾中就变成雨。

lineList.en: Which the clouds do drop and distil upon man abundantly.
lineList.cn: 云彩将雨落下，沛然降与世人。

lineList.en: Also can any understand the spreadings of the clouds, or the noise of his tabernacle?
lineList.cn: 谁能明白云彩如何铺张，和神行宫的雷声呢。

lineList.en: Behold, he spreadeth his light upon it, and covereth the bottom of the sea.
lineList.cn: 他将亮光普照在自己的四围。他又遮覆海底。

lineList.en: For by them judgeth he the people; he giveth meat in abundance.
lineList.cn: 他用这些审判众民，且赐丰富的粮食。

lineList.en: With clouds he covereth the light; and commandeth it not to shine by the cloud that cometh betwixt.
lineList.cn: 他以电光遮手，命闪电击中敌人（或作中了靶子）。

lineList.en: The noise thereof sheweth concerning it, the cattle also concerning the vapour.
lineList.cn: 所发的雷声显明他的作为，又向牲畜指明要起暴风。
